    • Method Detail

      • isUsingVault

        public final boolean isUsingVault()
        Returns a boolean type value that can be used to determine if the plugin is currently using currently using Vault.
        Returns:
        A boolean type value.

      • isPlayerBusy

        public final boolean isPlayerBusy​(Player player)
        Returns a boolean type value that can be used to determine if a player is marked as busy. While opening a mailbox, the receiver is marked as busy to not receive other mailboxes until it closes the currently opened one.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player type variable.
        Returns:
        A boolean type value.

      • isPlayerBusy

        public final boolean isPlayerBusy​(UUID playerUUID)
        Returns a boolean type value that can be used to determine if a player is marked as busy. While opening a mailbox, the receiver is marked as busy to not receive other mailboxes until it closes the currently opened one.
        Parameters:
        playerUUID - The player's unique id.
        Returns:
        A boolean type value.

      • isPlayerBusy

        @Deprecated
public final boolean isPlayerBusy​(String playerName)
        Deprecated.
        Replaced by isPlayerBusy(Player) or isPlayerBusy(UUID).
        Returns a boolean type value that can be used to determine if a player is marked as busy. While opening a mailbox, the receiver is marked as busy to not receive other mailboxes until it closes the currently opened one.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The player's name.
        Returns:
        A boolean type value.

        public final FileConfiguration getLanguageFile()
        Returns a FileConfiguration type value that can be used to determine the current language used by the plugin.

      • isMetricsEnabled

        public final boolean isMetricsEnabled()
        Returns a boolean type value that can be used to determine if the plugin is currently using bStats.
        Returns:
        A boolean type value.

      • sendSpecialMailbox

        public final void sendSpecialMailbox​(Player player,
                                     List<ItemStack> items)
        Method used to send items anonymously to any player on the server. The mailbox will be assigned as a "Special Mailbox".
        Parameters:
        player - The Player type variable.
        items - The list of items that the player will receive.

      • sendSpecialMailbox

        public final void sendSpecialMailbox​(UUID playerUUID,
                                     List<ItemStack> items)
        Method used to send items anonymously to any player on the server. The mailbox will be assigned as a "Special Mailbox".
        Parameters:
        playerUUID - The player's unique id.
        items - The list of items that the player will receive.

        Method used to send items anonymously to any player on the server. The mailbox will be assigned as a "Special Mailbox".
